update.foreach: UPDATE com_paasit_pai_core_employeeobj SET employeeNo = #{item.employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employeeName = #{item.employeeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastName = #{item.lastName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firstName = #{item.firstName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organizationCode = #{item.organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organizationName = #{item.organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
